name: The Final Broski
description:
Dude developed the power to manipulate matter, after stealing the kiwi from Bro. His anger and jealousy brought him to attack Bro and try to destroy the Earth. His overwhelming urge for power corrupted him. Now they battle it out to decide the fate of the planet, or even the universe. 

The art is entirely mine. The sound effects are mostly mine (I would like to resubmit when my brother finishes making a song to fit the game).

Online assets used: 

https://freesound.org/s/414070/
